T02D1467:46b-1: shr'i tsa kra samba ra ba lim bhi dhi:/
T02D1467:46b-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga / dngos kun gcig tu sngom pa yi //
T02D1467:46b-4: dpa' bo sngom pa la btud de //
T02D1467:46b-5: gtor ma'i de nyid mdor bsdus nas //
T02D1467:46b-6: man ngag ji bzhin bri bar bya //
T02D1467:46b-7: dang por slob dpon rnal 'byor chen pos gnas pa las langs te /
T02D1467:46b-8: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i
T02D1467:46b-9: sngags pas bza' ba la sogs pa mdun du byas
T02D1467:46b-11: de la mdun du yi ge yam las rlung gi
T02D1467:46b-12: dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge ram las me'i
T02D1467:46b-13: dkyil 'khor / de'i steng du yi ge gsum las
T02D1467:46b-14: skyes pa'i mgo bo gsum gyis byas pa'i sgyed po'i
T02D1467:46b-15: steng du yi ge aa dkar po las skyes pa'i
T02D1467:46b-16: padma nang dmar ba phyi dkar po /
T02D1467:46b-17: de'i nang du zan la sogs pa la aom tr'am a'am kham h'um /
T02D1467:46b-18: l'am m'am p'am t'am bam gyi yi ge las bskyed
T02D1467:46b-19: cing des byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga dang
T02D1467:46b-20: / sgron ma lnga'i rang bzhin du bskyed la /
T02D1467:47a-0: sa bon gyi yi ge la sogs pa rlung gi bskyod @47a * //
T02D1467:47a-1: pa'i me yis gdungs te zhu ba na /
T02D1467:47a-2: nyi ma 'char kha'i mdog can du bltas te /
T02D1467:47a-3: der dngul chu'i kha dog can gyi yi ge h'um
T02D1467:47a-4: las byung ba'i kha tv'am ga dkar po bdud rtsi'i
T02D1467:47a-5: rang bzhin can spyi po tshugs su 'dug pa zhu
T02D1467:47a-6: nas khu ba'i rdzas de dbul chu'i mdog can bsil
T02D1467:47a-8: de nas de'i steng du a'a li k'a li yongs
T02D1467:47a-9: su gyur pa'i yi ge aom a'a: h'um rnams rim
T02D1467:47a-10: pas steng nas steng du gnas pa las 'khor lo
T02D1467:47a-11: gsum gyi lha tshogs rnams spros te 'gro ba'i don
T02D1467:47a-12: byas nas snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba
T02D1467:47a-13: can gyis zhu bar gyur nas yi ge gsum po
T02D1467:47a-14: la ji lta ba bzhin gzhug go //
T02D1467:47a-15: de yang yi ge aom la sogs pa yang rim gyis zhu bar blta ste /
T02D1467:47a-16: ji srid 'dod par yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1467:47a-17: de nas 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang pheem gyi sngags
T02D1467:47a-18: dag gis bkug pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su
T02D1467:47a-19: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mdun du bzhag la /
T02D1467:47a-20: yon chab dang zhal bsil la sogs pa sngon du
T02D1467:47a-21: 'gro bas yang dag par mchod nas a'a li dang
T02D1467:47a-22: k'a li yongs su gyur pa las zla ba dang
T02D1467:47a-23: nyi ma'i rang bzhin gyi lag pa gnyis kyi nang
T02D1467:47a-24: du chud pa'i yi ge h'um bltas te /
T02D1467:47a-25: aom aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarbba dharm'a /
T02D1467:47a-26: spar spar aa nu ga ta sarbba dharm'a: aa tyan
T02D1467:47a-27: ta aa nu pra bishata sarbba dharma h'um zhes brjod
T02D1467:47a-28: pa sngon du 'gro bas zla ba dang nyi ma
T02D1467:47a-29: la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa
T02D1467:47a-30: las rdo rje thal mor byas pa'i lag mthil du
T02D1467:47a-31: bdud rtsi'i snod gzhag pa'am yang na bsgoms la /
T02D1467:47a-32: de'i 'og tu bdag gir bya ba'i don 'di gdon te /
T02D1467:47a-33: lha mo tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang //
T02D1467:47a-34: des gsungs tshig kyang tshad ma mchog yin pa'i //
T02D1467:47a-35: bden pa 'dis ni lha mo 'di dag rnams //
T02D1467:47a-36: bdag la rjes su 'dzin pa'i rgyur gyur cig / de nas mchod par bya ba dang /
T02D1467:47a-38: mchod pa rnams tha mi dad par bltas pas bdud
T02D1467:47a-39: rtsi'i snod de shar nas phyogs su g-yon skor gyis
T02D1467:47a-40: dang / mtshams su me'i mtshams nas brtsams te g-yas su bskor zhing /
T02D1467:47a-41: 'khor lo gsum gyi lha h'um las byung pa'i rdo rje dkar po'i lce nas tsam bsams nas /
T02D1467:47a-46: kosha bha ya kosha bha ya /
T02D1467:47b-6: ba sa ru dhi ra aantra m'a la /
T02D1467:47b-8: gri hna gri hna sa pta p'a t'a la ga
T02D1467:47b-9: ta bhu dzam ga / sar pam b'a ta rdza
T02D1467:47b-21: h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1467:47b-22: zhes bya ba 'di lan cig brjod pas dbul lo //
T02D1467:47b-23: bcom ldan 'das shes rab dang bcas pa /
T02D1467:47b-24: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs dang khva gdong ma la
T02D1467:47b-25: sogs pa rnams la yang ci rigs pas bskor zhing
T02D1467:47b-26: / aom badzra aa ralli ho: dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a ki n+ya /
T02D1467:47b-27: sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho: zhes bya ba
T02D1467:47b-28: 'di lan gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi'am lnga
T02D1467:47b-32: tam po la sogs pa phul te //
T02D1467:47b-33: pi wang ma la sogs pas /
T02D1467:47b-34: bha wa shams ma sam ga / bha gna sam
T02D1467:47b-35: ka lpa bha g'a: kha mi ba sa ka la
T02D1467:47b-36: bha bam / bh'a ba to bi ksha m'a n'a:
T02D1467:47b-37: gu rat ra ku ru n'a mbha: siphad tsa tit
T02D1467:47b-38: bha bam / mbu n'a th'a / ku ru ku
T02D1467:47b-39: ru ta de byo ma yaya ti b'a nu kam
T02D1467:47b-40: bha bam / mbu n'a th'a / p'a / mchod nas bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1467:47b-41: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang ba ni /
T02D1467:47b-42: srid zhi mnyam par mkhyen zhing kun srid ba zhi ba mnyam pa sogs kyi skad dod /
T02D1467:47b-44: de nyid du na dngos kun mkha' ltar gzigs gyur cing //
T02D1467:47b-45: thugs kyi padma rab lci thugs rje'i chus rgyas pa //
T02D1467:47b-46: lha mo rnams kyis bdag la shin tu brtser mdzod
T02D1467:47b-47: cig / de nas dur khrod brgyad na gnas pa'i
T02D1467:47b-48: phyogs skyong rnams la snga ma ltar bskor zhing /
T02D1467:47b-49: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'i hi /
T02D1467:47b-50: sarbba yaksha r'a ksha sa bh'u ta /
T02D1467:47b-51: pre ta pi sh'a tsa aunma da /
T02D1467:47b-53: badzra d'a ka d'a ki n+ya ya /
T02D1467:47b-56: ma ma sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha na tu /
T02D1467:47b-57: ya thee bam ya the shtam bhu nydza tha /
T02D1467:47b-58: pi ba tha dzi ghra tha m'a ti kra ma tha /
T02D1467:47b-59: ma ma sarbba k'a rta ya /
T02D1467:47b-60: sarta su kham bi brid dha yes ha yi k'a bha bantu h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1467:47b-61: zhes lan gnyis brjod pas bstabs par bya'o //
T02D1467:47b-62: bdud rtsi de zos pas phyogs skyong la sogs pa
T02D1467:47b-63: rnams chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba can ji
T02D1467:47b-64: lta ba bzhin bde ba chen pos lus rgyas par
T02D1467:47b-65: bsgom mo // de nas spyir tam po la sogs pa phul te /
T02D1467:48a-1: las byung ba'i pi wang ma la sogs pa rnams
T02D1467:48a-2: kyis yang dag par mchod nas rkang pa brgyad pa'i
T02D1467:48a-4: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub blangs la /
T02D1467:48a-5: brda'i lag pas brda byas nas ma tshang ba dang lhag ma bskang ba'i don du /
T02D1467:48a-6: aom badzra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02D1467:48a-7: he ru ka tve no pa tishtha /
T02D1467:48a-9: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1467:48a-10: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1467:48a-11: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1467:48a-13: sarba karma su tsa me rtsi tatam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D1467:48a-14: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na /
T02D1467:48a-15: badzra he ru ka m'a me mu nyatsa /
T02D1467:48a-16: badzra ha ru ko bha ba /
T02D1467:48a-17: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva a'a: h'um phat /
T02D1467:48a-18: ces bya ba'i yi ge brgya pa'i sngags /
T02D1467:48a-19: dril bu dkrol ba sngon du 'gro bas brjod do //
T02D1467:48a-20: de nas aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharma yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1467:48a-21: zhes brjod cing pa dkor gyi phyag rgyas mnyes par byas la /
T02D1467:48a-22: phyag rgya btul te 'khyud pa'i gdengs sa ka sngon
T02D1467:48a-23: du 'gro bas srin lag dang mthe bos se gol
T02D1467:48a-24: gtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis /
T02D1467:48a-25: aom badzra mu: zhes bton pas gshegs su gsol te /
T02D1467:48a-26: 'khor lo de bdag nyid la gzhug go //
T02D1467:48a-27: gtor ma'i cho ga bris pas bdag la ni //
T02D1467:48a-28: bsod nams gang skyes de ni myur nyid du //
T02D1467:48a-29: 'gro ba gsum po rtog pa'i dra ba dag /
T02D1467:48a-30: rnam bsal 'khor lo gsum gyi ngo bor shog /
T02D1467:48a-31: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga /
T02D1467:48a-32: slob dpon chen po pra dzny'a rakshi tas mdzad pa
T02D1467:48a-34: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpas su ma ti k'i rti'i zhal snga nas dang /
